descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...one completed pattern and two incomplete patterns of different colors.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as the input size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...complete the same pattern with the two incomplete patterns, going in the same direction as the line dictates, with one space between each pattern continuing to the border.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a pattern of blocks in a distinct shape (e.g. a cross, a square, etc) with an unfinished arrangement of blocks on some of its sides.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...remains the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...use the unfinished arrangement of blocks to form the central shape and continue forming the shape until the end of the grid. Repeat on every side that has an unfinished pattern. Be sure to use whatever color the unfinished pattern started with for each row (it may be a different color from the central shape.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... a large colored shape and smaller colored shapes next to, above, below or diagonal from the largest shape.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is the same as the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... copy the input grid. Then build onto the smaller shapes so that they become the same as the original main shape, but do not change their color. Then, continue to draw the same shape in the same color and at the same distance until you reach the end of the grid. So if it is a square, keep adding squares at an equal distance until you reach the edge of the grid. If it is a plus sign or any other shape, do the same. Repeat this in any direction where a small shape is near the original big shape.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...good  nice one
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...nice one much nice
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...good one

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a design pattern with incomplete patterns in different colors next to it on a black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as the input size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...complete the same pattern in the differing color all the way to the edge of the grid along the same direction or line that it starts at,

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... black background with one whole shape and other half-done shapes to its sides.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... copy the input grid. Then create the shapes that look like the whole shape starting from the given half-done shapes. Continue creating the same shape with the same size all the way to the end of the black background side.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... black background with one whole shape and other half-done shapes to its sides.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... copy the input grid. Then create the shapes that look like the whole shape starting from the given half-done shapes. Continue creating the same shape with the same size all the way to the end of the black background side.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a small grey object with six grey squares in an almost square pattern with a black hole of one square in the middle, an object of two pink squares to the top right of it and a small object of 3 blue squares to the bottom right of it.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... 1st: make the pink and blue objects look exactly like the grey object with the original pink part on the bottom left of the object and the blue on the top.2nd.  repeat the pink object upwards diagonal of 3 squares (it will be cut off by the top just do what you can.3rd: repeat the blue object diagonal by one square (the 3rd will be cut off a bit)

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a reference shape, which will be the shape with the most blocks, with various colored blocks to its sides.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stays the same size.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... replicate the reference shape, using the color of the other  blocks as a start point and then replicate that pattern to the edge of the grid, even if it needs a incomplete shape.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a central, complete pattern with incomplete patterns of differing colors around it
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as input size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...replicate the central pattern for each surrounding incomplete pattern, using the color of the surrounding pattern, along the same direction of the surrounding pattern, and reproduce it as necessary until the end of the square

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a design pattern with incomplete patterns in different colors next to it on a black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as the input size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...complete the same pattern in the differing color all the way to the edge of the grid along the same direction or line that it starts at.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a larger shape and smaller shapes
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stays the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...duplicate the larger shape using the color and location of each smaller shape.  Once you have done that, you will need to continue the shape pattern to the edges of the grid.  That is make more duplicates being spaced the same distance and direction until you hit the edge of the grid.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...incomplete patterns in gray, pink and blue.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as the output
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...complete the pattern for the other two colors which are blue and pink to be just like shape of gray and from there follow the same space and continue the draw to the end.
